Line1.7FA05: They were like brother and sister to me once, but life has taken us on different paths.
Line3.7FA05: Airidah is consumed with her task of watching over the dead. I long for a time we can meet and discuss old histories, like we used to.
Line5.7FA05: And Nafain...well, it's a shame heâ€™s become so bitter. Lives like a recluse deep in the woods. Refuses to meet with me.
